text: Louisiana's 4th congressional district is a congressional district in the U.S. state of Louisiana. The district is in the northwestern part of the state. They mainly covers Shreveport-Bossier City. It also includes the cities of Minden, DeRidder, and Natchitoches. The district is represented by Republican Mike Johnson. ==References== Category:Politics of Louisiana Category:Congressional districts of Louisiana
title: Louisiana's 4th congressional district
